sentence.idiomatic: They are performing a privileged transaction.
He hates doing money transactions with others.
What are you trading?
Is there a way to look up cell phone numbers?
I'm checking my account.
The staff are checking the passport.
You can't move around arbitrarily in the plane.
You can choose freely from these things.
You can choose your dance partner as you wish.
How much did you overdraw?
I've seriously overdrew last month.
You have no right to overdraw.
I want to proceed a transaction.
Our bank doesn't have fund transfer services.
Where do you want to transfer funds to?
An ID card is a valid piece of identification.
Bills all have validity periods.
Is my passport still valid?
He didn't show his employee card.
Did he show the bill?
Please show your ID card.
Hello. Can I open a bank account?
Certainly. Could you please give me a valid ID?
No problem. Here is my passport.
Thank you. Please fill out a new account application form. You may choose to open a current funds account or fixed-term deposit account. Just check the box of your choice.
All right. Do I need to fill out anything else?

word.literal: transfer money from into an account

sentence.idiomatic: Please write down your contact information and address here. The type of account you chose will allow you to deposit and withdraw funds, transfer funds, and make purchases, but you cannot overdraw.
Will I be able to withdraw money from an ATM after I open the account? Do I need to pay a fee?

You can use the card at any of our bank's ATM in the city, and there is no service charge for checking account balance or withdrawal. However, if you do any transactions at other banks' ATM, these transactions will be subject to a service charge.
All right, I see. Thank you.

word.literal: transfer money from into an account
